creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e); ink on paper, with hand-applied color and nikawa
text: Several prints of raptors signed by or attributed to Torii Kiyomasu I and II exist. Many of the designs are similar to those appearing in the book "Past and Present Writings about Falcons: The Clenched Fist" (Kokon taka no sho: Nigiri kobushi), a book on falconry with 48 images, published in 1687.
title: Raptor capturing a crane in flight
